xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
Class PointQuery

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.SecureDecoratorCursor<E>
      xxl.core.cursors.filters.Filter<KPE>
          xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors.RegionQuery
              xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors.PointQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<KPE>, Cursor<KPE>
public class PointQuery
extends RegionQuery

A Point query returns all the indexed geometries which contain a specified point It can be realised as a special form of the window- query where the query- object is a point an the refinement predicate is 'within'.

Constructor Detail

PointQuery

public PointQuery(RTree index,
                  Point2D point,
                  Function<KPE,Geometry2D> getGeometry)
Creates a new PointQuery index. This constructor just calls the super-class constructor with the given parameters and the Within.

Parameters:
index - the RTree which indexes the spatial data
point - the query point
getGeometry - a Function which determines how to extract the geometries from the index- trees' leafs
(The leaf- entries of the tree may contain the geometry or just a pointer to it)
